conbody.p: Below is how to capture an image of the desired Mobile elements for interaction during test executions:

li.p: Start your AUT with Mobile Spy/Recorder. Remember to have your mobile device connected to Katalon Studio.
Click Capture Object to capture an image of the screen.
Open a screenshot in the screenshot folder and crop the recognition area that Katalon Studio will use for searching matching elements during test execution (reference image).
